_header: Fain would I with all diligence
_description: ‘The Danger of Wryting’, attributed to William Dunbar — seven 5-line stanzas with refrain, ‘Thus wait I nocht quhairof to wryt’

CamMagPep2553.First Lines:
ffane wald I with all diligenceAne sang mak plesand of
                    sentence…
CamMagPep2553.Last Lines:
…And me to vther delytingThus wait I nocht quhair of to
                    wryt
